events.body: **Join us for a 4th of July Celebration at Nasketucket Bay Vineyard. We are open from 12-4. Live music by Butch McCarthy & The Gents from 12-3. Food Trucks: BBQ Y Mas and Sorbae Frozen Treats from 12-4. All ages are welcome. $10 cover charge at the door per person.**

events.title: Maker Session - Burlap Wreath
events.body: Maker Sessions at Nasketucket Bay Vineyard are an opportunity to let your creative juices flow, every other Thursday night. Learn a new craft, taught by a local artisan while you sip wine and create your very own masterpiece to take home! This week's Maker's Session is a 16” Burlap Welcome Wreath, hosted by Jamie from J&P Wreaths. Tickets are $60 per person and include all materials needed to create your work of art that you can take home.  Wine and food are not included in the ticket price. No outside food or drink is allowed. Wine, drink specials and specialty food items are available to purchase in the vineyard farm store to nosh on during your class.

events.title: Maker Session - Sea Glass Resin Art
events.body: Maker Sessions at Nasketucket Bay Vineyard are an opportunity to let your creative juices flow, every other Thursday night. Learn a new craft, taught by a local artisan while you sip wine and create your very own masterpiece to take home! This week's Maker's Session is an 8x10 sea glass resin art piece, hosted by Tracy at Resin Galore & More. Tickets are $60 per person and include all materials needed to create your work of art that you can take home.  Wine and food are not included in the ticket price. No outside food or drink is allowed. Wine, drink specials and specialty food items are available to purchase in the vineyard farm store to nosh on during your class. PLEASE NOTE: This particular art medium requires 24 hours to cure before you can bring it home. Art projects can be picked up at the vineyard the following day or any day that weekend.

events.title: Weights & Wine w/Ashley Kelley
events.body: Welcome to **Weights and Wine**! Join us for a fun morning of fitness and relaxation at **Nasketucket Bay Vineyard**. Get ready to break a sweat with a high-energy workout, followed by a well-deserved glass of wine. This is the perfect opportunity to unwind, socialize, and treat yourself after a challenging workout. Don't miss out on this unique event that combines fitness and fun in a beautiful setting. Grab your workout gear and get ready to lift, sip, and enjoy!

events.title: Maker Session - Charcuterie Board Class w/Cindy from Savor the Spread, Marion
events.body:
Maker Sessions at Nasketucket Bay Vineyard are an opportunity to let your creative juices flow, every other Thursday night. Learn a new craft, taught by a local artisan while you sip wine and create your very own masterpiece to take home! This Maker Session is a 10" round charcuterie board, hosted by Cindy Servais from Savor the Spread in Marion! Tickets are $60 per person and include all materials needed to create your charcuterie that you can take home or enjoy at the vineyard! Wine and additional food are not included in the ticket price. No outside food or drink is allowed. Wine, drink specials, mock-tails and specialty food items are available to purchase in the vineyard farm store to nosh on during your class!

This is an all-ages event. Tickets must be purchased in advance.

Enjoy an outdoor yoga class, set in the picturesque background of Nasketucket Bay Vineyard!

The yoga class, led by Christine Noonan, is designed for all levels, including beginners. After you move and breathe in the fresh air and sunshine, sip on a glass of wine while you stroll the vineyard or relax on the patio. Bring a yoga mat or towel, water, sunscreen, and anything else you need for your practice. Pre-registration required. All ages are welcome!

Must be 21 to drink alcohol but mock-tails are available!
events.title: Yoga by the Vines with Christine Noonan
Yoga By The Vines with Christine Noonan
events.body:

events.title: Maker Session - Paint Night
events.body: Maker Sessions at Nasketucket Bay Vineyard are an opportunity to let your creative juices flow, every other Thursday night. Learn a new craft, taught by a local artisan while you sip wine and create your very own masterpiece to take home! This week's Maker's Session is a seaside-themed painting taught by Jenny Laurie. Tickets do not include food and drink. Wine, wine cocktails or non-alcoholic mocktails are available for purchase before and during the class as well as a variety of locally sourced cheeses, crackers, meats, snacks that you can nosh on while you paint! This is an all ages event and tickets must be purchased in advance to attend.

events.title: Wine & Cheese Pairing Class with Missa Capozzo
events.body:
Join us for an enchanting journey as we invite you to a captivating wine and cheese pairing experience at Nasketucket Bay Vineyard in Fairhaven, MA! Led by Wine Educator Missa Capozzo of Wine Down Events, this 90-minute event promises to tantalize your taste buds and expand your knowledge of wine and food pairing.

The evening will include:

🍇 A guided pairing featuring five exquisite Nasketucket Bay Vineyard wines.\
🍰 A delectable variety of expertly paired cheeses by local dairy farm *Smith's Country Cheese* to complement the flavors of the wines and elevate your tasting experience.\
🎓 Insightful guidance from your wine educator as she shares the fundamentals of wine and food pairing, providing valuable tips and tricks to enhance your enjoyment of both wine and food.

Join us for an unforgettable evening of indulgence and education amidst the scenic beauty of Nasketucket Bay Vineyard. Whether you're a wine enthusiast or a novice explorer, this experience promises something special for everyone.\
\
Feel free to arrive early to enjoy the vineyard and purchase a glass of wine to enjoy prior to the event.\
\
This is a 21+ event. Please note there are no refunds.

Maker Sessions at Nasketucket Bay Vineyard are an opportunity to let your creative juices flow, every other Thursday night. Learn a new craft, taught by a local artisan while you sip wine and create your very own masterpiece to take home! events.title: Maker Session: Sea Glass Resin Art
events.body:
Maker Sessions at Nasketucket Bay Vineyard are an opportunity to let your creative juices flow, every other Thursday night. Learn a new craft, taught by a local artisan while you sip wine and create your very own masterpiece to take home! This Maker Session is a sea glass resin art piece hosted by Resin Galore & More! This class was a huge hit in June! Wine and additional food are not included in the ticket price. No outside food or drink is allowed. Wine, drink specials, mock-tails and specialty food items are available to purchase in the vineyard farm store to nosh on during your class!

\*\*Please note that the resin needs to cure overnight, undisturbed so the art pieces will have to be picked up the next day from the vineyard.\*\*

events.body: Don't miss out on the first comedy night at the vineyard. This is a 21+ event and tickets must be purchase in advance.

events.title: Vino & Vinyasa w/ Jen Risio of The Studio
events.body: Get ready to uncork your potential with the Vino & Vinyasa class hosted at the vineyard by instructors from The Studio @ Mattapoisett Wellness Center. Whether you're a downward dog pro or a tree pose newbie, this series is all about savoring the sweet serenity of yoga in a vineyard setting. Tickets must be purchased in advance.

events.title: Maker Session - Sea Glass Succulent w/These Two Crafty Chicks
events.body: Maker Sessions at Nasketucket Bay Vineyard are an opportunity to let your creative juices flow, every other Thursday night. Learn a new craft, taught by a local artisan while you sip wine and create your very own masterpiece to take home! This Maker Session is a sea glass succulent piece hosted by [These Two Craft Chicks](https://www.facebook.com/thesetwocraftychicks)! Wine and food are not included in the ticket price. No outside food or drink is allowed. Wine, drink specials, mock-tails and specialty food items are available to purchase in the vineyard farm store to nosh on during your class!

events.title: Rosé Release Party!
events.body: We are celebrating the first new wine being added to our menu since we opened in April! Come Fly With Me Rosé is here and we can't wait to share it with you! Enjoy music from Italian piano player, Marco Marinelli while you sip on your rosé and sample food offerings from our store. Make sure you wear pink to get your free rosé sample and snag an Instagram-worthy photo in our photo wreath on your way in! No tickets, reservations or cover charge. All ages, and dogs welcome on the patio.

events.title: Hookah & Wine Night
events.body: We're bringing the hookah lounge to the vineyard! Join us for an evening of hookah, Mediterranean food and of course... WINE! Hookahs can be reserved in advance by emailing info@peacelovevino.net. Tickets are not required but reservations are advised for the hookahs. Phoenix on the Fly food truck will be here serving up a mediterranean inspired menu. Hookah service and cigar pop-up store provided by Lava On the Hill, Providence. Dogs allowed outside.

**Fridays are for Fido, Food Trucks and Flight Specials!**

*Our 4-legged friends are welcome on the patio or green spaces. 15% off wine flights and 15% off "barkuterie" boards from our store for your furry companion. The food truck will be pumping out delicious eats from 3-8.*

**Today's Food Truck: [Raffa Chimi's](https://www.facebook.com/raffachimis) from** ***3-8***
events.title: Fido Friday & Raffa Chimi's Food Truck
Hookah, Wine & Taco Night!
events.body:
Join us for Hookah, Wine and Tacos from [Gonzalez Food Truck](https://www.facebook.com/foodtruckgonzalez) from 4-8! Reservations for the hookahs are recommended as they fill up fast! Reserve your hookah today by clicking on the button below. This is a weather-dependent event and will be cancelled and refunded in the event that there is rain. 

Hookah rentals are $40 for 90 minutes and include unlimited coals and shisha!

events.title: Harvest Kick-Off Celebration
events.body: Live Music, vendors, food trucks and much more! Stay tuned for more details!
